description: Keen's iconic hiking shoe for men brings an updated look to all-terrain adventures. They carried over the fit, durability, and performance of their award-winning Targhee waterproof boot and took its rugged looks to a new dimension.
name: Keen Targhee III WP - Mens

specs.value: A proprietary waterproof, breathable membrane that lets vapor out without letting water in
This internal support mechanism is anatomically engineered to provide excellent arch support and cradle the natural contours of the foot
